org.elasticsearch.index.percolator.stats

Class ShardPercolateService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.shard.AbstractIndexShardComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.index.percolator.stats.ShardPercolateService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexShardComponent

    public class ShardPercolateService
extends AbstractIndexShardComponent
    Shard level percolator service that maintains percolator metrics:
    • total time spent in percolate api
    • the current number of percolate requests
    • number of registered percolate queries
